TopicTitle: Stock shaders show as black in-flight

Articles.Content:
Hello! 

I have been using mods like restock for some time now, but the problem is that some parts of the solar panels, for example between the blue cells, show s gray in the VAB and in flight as black.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1735617263 <--- link to screenshot because im new to the forums and dont know how to use pictures, oh and the small cubesats are from wells knes mod, but in VAB they are golden, in flight also black.

EDIT 1: reallised i placed this topic in the wrong subforum, oops!
